name: Baldimore Comstocks Mello School
description:
This mod was requested by 6yearoldplays! Check him out: https://www.twitch.tv/6yearoldplays

Welcome to Baldimore Comstocks Mello School! Here you will learn how to keep it mello and be the best music artist! Baldimore is the teacher, and he wants you to perfect everything! If you solve something incorrectly, he will start to chase you! Do everything you can to find all the books, and get out of the school!
